source_objects.description: From negotiation tactics to communication strategies, winning friends to persuading colleagues, learn how to most effectively make an impact with these courses on influence.
source_objects.title: Influence

items.title: Influencing Others Positively at Work and in Life
items.headline: Learn important influence skills that are effective and helps change people positvely
objectives_summary: Learn to influence others for a positive change
Learn effective influence strategies

items.title: Solution-Focused Brief Therapy

visible_instructors.job_title: Peronal development training for life and career
visible_instructors.title: Barry Winbolt
visible_instructors.name: Barry

items.headline: Learn SFBT skills for creative conversations and better outcomes. With video of live sessions.
objectives_summary: Use solution-focused techniques and ideas to shape outcome oriented conversations with others.
Understand the purpose of a variety of techniques associated with the solution-focused approach and apply them.

items.title: Persuasion Machine: Master Persuasion Psychology & Influence
items.headline: Master the Secrets of Persuasion Psychology & Learn the Communication Skills to Influence Anyone in Business & Life.
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to master the skills to become more persuasive and influential in their everyday lives
How develop the communication skills to get people to say "Yes" more often
A strong understanding of the underlying psychological principles of persuasion and influence

items.title: People Power: How to influence anyone anywhere

visible_instructors.job_title: Delivering Change & Learning Strategies for Personal Growth
visible_instructors.name: Philip
visible_instructors.title: Philip Atkinson

items.headline: Mastering People Skills a practical compendium of strategies and tactics of interpersonal  influence and persuasion.
objectives_summary: Develop a structure and strategy for influencing others
Create their personal influencing brand and style for winning business and building relationships
Understand the dynamics and key steps in building rapport with others

items.title: Communication Skills: Become A Superstar Communicator

visible_instructors.job_title: Social Entrepreneur, Applied Psychology Instructor & Author
visible_instructors.title: Kain Ramsay
visible_instructors.name: Kain

items.headline: Transform the quality of your relationships by maximising the impact of your verbal and non-verbal communication skills.
objectives_summary: Understand why good communication skills are important and beneficial.
Communicate your message in a way that is clear, concise and embraced by others.
Understand how to connect and interact with others in an interesting and engaging way.

items.title: Voice Training - Proven Methods to Improve Your Vocal Skills

visible_instructors.job_title: Voice Training for Absolute Beginners to Advanced Mastery!
visible_instructors.title: Voiceover Masterclass
visible_instructors.name: Voiceover

items.headline: Professional Voice Training Exercises and Techniques Guaranteed to Make Your Voice Sound More Powerful and Authoritative
objectives_summary: You will be able to project your voice more and make people listen to you.
You will be able to captivate your audience and leave them wanting more!
You will be able to stand in front of an audience and deliver powerful and memorable speeches.

items.title: Voice Training - Develop A Deeper, Sexy & Charismatic Voice

visible_instructors.job_title: Voice Training for Absolute Beginners to Advanced Mastery!
visible_instructors.title: Voiceover Masterclass
visible_instructors.name: Voiceover

items.headline: Follow a step-by-step plan for a richer more attractive and resonant speaking voice that people will love to listen to.
objectives_summary: Discover how the human speaking voice is created and how you can learn to feel the vibrations and resonances in your own body to open up your own voice to improve its richness and depth.
Daily exercises to “unlearn” any bad speech habits and gain new confidence with a more attractive and magnetic voice to help you communicate with others in business and in your private life.
A proven 7 day plan that works! Although you can spread out the viewing if you wish.

items.title: 5 Decision-Making Techniques for Success
items.headline: Learn the Most Effective Business Decision-Making Techniques to Achieve Personal and Professional Success
objectives_summary: apply 5 decision-making techniques to personal situations
apply 5 decision-making techniques to personal situations
understand decision making habits

items.title: Speak Up! Stand Out and be HAPPY
items.headline: Polish your communication skills by learning simple techniques + easy adjustments to your mind, voice + body.
objectives_summary: Set your course for success.
Tame the voice of your inner critic.
Stay calm and focused.

items.title: As a Leader: Influencing Behavior in the 21st Century
items.headline: Concise Leadership Training for Organizations
objectives_summary: Prolong a positive impact on your employees
Influence behavior
Connect employee values to desired behaviors

items.title: The Willpower Habit
items.headline: The secret to remarkable self-discipline that lasts.
objectives_summary: How to get the most out of this course in record time.
Implement and master the SCORE Method (Made up of the 5 Willpower Habits) and begin building incredible willpower-on-demand.
Add empowering new behaviours. Examples include meditation, exercise, portion control, patience, becoming an early riser etc.

items.headline: How To Detect Facial Expressions and Body Language to Increase your Emotional Intelligence with an average of 10%
objectives_summary: Increase your Emotional Intelligence with an average of 10%
Improve your Sales Skills, because those who can read Micro Expressions well, sell 20% more products
Predict Your Success or Failure in every Negotiation, before it is expressed verbally

items.title: Communication Skills - Boost Charisma and Confidence

items.headline: Communication Skills. Public Speaking. Charisma. Self Esteem. Speaking. Body Language. Charisma. Influence. Arguments.
objectives_summary: Be a better communicator both in your social and your business life
Learn about the biggest body language mistakes
Learn how to handle difficult conversations & arguments

items.title: Psychology of Persuasion: How to Convince People Easily
items.headline: Learn Effective Psychological Techniques How to Persuade, Win Sympathy and Convince even the most Stubborn People
objectives_summary: Utilize special phrases and persuasion techniques to increase their convincing abilities
Feel more confident and comfortable during an argument with a friend, colleague, customer or family member
Understand when people try to influence your decision or choice using similar persuasion techniques

items.title: Persuasion Power 1: Effective Communication Skills
items.headline: The Ultimate Guide to Persuasion Psychology - Better Relationships, More Influence and Respect - Persuasion Hacks
objectives_summary: Skillfully CAPTURE and Lead Your Audience's Attention
CREATE Deep Levels of Rapport Quickly
PERSUADE People to Accept Your Suggestions and/or Outcome(s)

items.title: Workshop Facilitation Masterclass
items.headline: Learn to use the full power of the workshop to generate great solutions, energise stakeholders and secure buy-in.
objectives_summary: Design and facilitate engaging workshops which deliver results
Use basic tools - flip charts, post-its etc along with our secret weapon - to make workshops go with a zing
Use advanced workshop structures such as backcasting.
